get.description: Fetches a list of all product categories, including soft deleted ones. Returns an empty array if no categories exist.

post.description: Allows creation of a new product category with a unique name

get.description: Fetches details of a product category by its unique identifier

put.description: Allows updating the name of an existing product category

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the category to update

400.description: Category not found or validation error

delete.description: Marks a product category as deleted without removing it from the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the category to soft delete

patch.summary: Restore a soft deleted product category
patch.description: Restores a previously soft deleted product category

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the category to restore

404.description: Category not found or not deleted

message.example: Category not found or not deleted

get.description: Fetches a list of all products, including soft deleted ones. Returns an empty array if no products exist.

post.description: Creates a new product with the provided details

get.description: Fetches a single product by its UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the product to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing product with the provided details

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the product to update

delete.description: Soft deletes a product by its UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the product to soft delete

patch.description: Restores a previously soft deleted product by its UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the product to restore

404.description: Product not found or not deleted

bearerAuth.description: Masukkan token di kolom ini untuk mengakses endpoint yang memerlukan autentikasi
